Quickstart CLI Mode
=====================

Interactive
++++++++++++

.. code:: shell

    jinjamator -t <path_to_task or path_to_tasklet> -o <name_of_output_plugin>

Via shebang
++++++++++++

.. code-block:: bash

    #!/usr/bin/env -S python3 -m jinjamator.jinjamator <misc options> -t

or

.. code-block:: bash

    #!/usr/bin/env -S jinjamator <misc options> -t
